#This is the description of the basic actor class

= `Basic_Actor` =
_Extends pygame.sprite.Sprite_

This class will implement the basic requirements to any entity moving in the game's world. It inherits from pygame's Sprite class and from the StateMachineClass to implement AI.

Features needed:

 * Implements a finite state machine using the [StateMachineClass state machine class]. 
 * Implements [SteeringBehaviour steering behaviour]
